name: Democracy - OWID based on Boix-Miller-Rosato
title: Democracy - OWID based on Boix-Miller-Rosato
description:
This dataset provides information on political regimes, using data from Boix et al. (2013).

We slightly expand the countries and years covered.

You can read a description of the data in this post: https://ourworldindata.org/democracies-measurement

You can download the code and complete dataset, including supplementary variables, from GitHub: https://github.com/owid/notebooks/tree/main/BastianHerre/political_regimes

sources.name: Political regimes - OWID based on Boix et al. (2013)
sources.additionalInfo:
This dataset provides information on political regimes, using data from Boix et al. (2013).

We slightly expand the countries and years covered.

You can read a description of the data in this post: https://ourworldindata.org/democracies-measurement

You can download the code and complete dataset, including supplementary variables, from GitHub: https://github.com/owid/notebooks/tree/main/BastianHerre/political_regimes
sources.dataPublishedBy: Our World in Data, Bastian Herre
sources.dataPublisherSource: Data comes from Boix et al. (2013), with own expansions and refinements.

fields.name: regime_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The variable identifies the political regime of a country using the classification by political scientists Carles Boix, Michael Miller, and Sebastian Rosato. It distinguishes between (electoral) democracies (score 1) and non-democracies (score 0).

It is based on the variable democracy_omitteddata.

Democracies are political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage in free and fair elections.

fields.name: dem_age_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage in free and fair elections.

fields.name: dem_age_group_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage in free and fair elections.

The variable distinguishes between non-democracies (score of 0), democracies aged 1-18 years (score of 1), 19-30 years (score of 2), 31-60 years (score of 3), 61-90 years (score of 4), and 91+ years (score of 5).

fields.name: regime_womsuffr_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The variable identifies the political regime of a country using the classification by political scientists Carles Boix, Michael Miller, and Sebastian Rosato. It distinguishes between (electoral) democracies (score 1) and non-democracies (score 0).

It is based on the variable democracy_femalesuffrage.

Democracies are political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage for both men and women in free and fair elections.

fields.name: dem_ws_age_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage for both men and women in free and fair elections.

fields.name: dem_ws_age_group_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage for both men and women in free and fair elections.

The variable distinguishes between non-democracies (score of 0), democracies aged 1-18 years (score of 1), 19-30 years (score of 2), 31-60 years (score of 3), 61-90 years (score of 4), and 91+ years (score of 5).

fields.name: regime_imputed_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes whether we imputed regime information from another country this one was historically a part of.

fields.name: regime_imputed_country_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the country from which we imputed regime information this country was historically a part of.

fields.name: dem_exp_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The variable identifies the number of years a country was a democracy since 1800.

The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage in free and fair elections.

fields.name: dem_ws_exp_bmr_owid
fields.description:
The variable identifies the number of years a country was a democracy since 1800.

The identification of democracies is based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

Democracies are understood here as political systems in which political leaders are elected under broad suffrage for both men and women in free and fair elections.

fields.name: number_nondem_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of non-democracies based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_nondem_womsuffr_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of non-democracies, account for women's suffrage, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_womsuffr_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies, including women's suffrage, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_18_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies aged 1-18, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_30_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies aged 19-30, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_60_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies aged 31-60, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_90_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies aged 61-90, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_91plus_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies aged 91 and older, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_ws_18_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies (including women's suffrage) aged 1-18, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_ws_30_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies (including women's suffrage) aged 19-30, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_ws_60_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies (including women's suffrage) aged 31-60, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_ws_90_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies (including women's suffrage) aged 61-90, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: number_dem_ws_91plus_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of democracies (including women's suffrage) aged 91 and older, as based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: pop_nondem_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in non-democracies based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: pop_dem_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in democracies based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: pop_missreg_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in countries without regime data, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: pop_nondem_womsuffr_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in non-democracies, accounting for women's suffrage, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.name: pop_dem_womsuffr_bmr_owid
fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in democracies, including women's suffrage, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in democracies aged 1-18, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).

fields.description: The variable denotes the number of people living in democracies aged 61-90, accounting for women's suffrage, based on the classification by Boix et al. (2013).
